page.title: 16A JET PLANE TAKES OFF
page.content: The sound of{jet engines}is a familiar one in the area.Their high pitched {roar}can be heard all around.But nowhere is the sound more{ear} {shattering}than at the end of the runway.Here everyday{visitors}gather in their cars parked on the grass verge facing down the runway.They have plenty to see-aircraft practising touch downs fly overhead,their wheels just missing the tops of the cars.The most exciting event is when a{Jet} {Provost}taxis towards them.It comes right to the end of the{runway}and then turns,engines ticking over,then stops.The{bird scarer}moves into position,its loud screams can be heard above the engine.Then suddenly the {roar}of the engine builds up and the plane shakes violently.The engines get louder,then suddenly the plane moves off down the runway-up and away.
